jobs.companyDescription: A community-first business focused on supporting local operations with smooth office management and clerical support.
jobs.positionDescription: You’ll assist in day-to-day office duties and support leadership in managing schedules, documents, and communication.
responsibilities: Greet visitors and handle phone calls.
requirements: High school diploma or equivalent.
Strong organizational and communication skills.
Familiarity with Microsoft Office or Google Workspace.
Ability to multitask and stay organized.

jobs.companyDescription: We specialize in building robust web platforms and scalable digital solutions for government and private sector clients across the FSM.
jobs.positionDescription: As a Software Engineer, you’ll develop full-stack applications that solve real problems for our community.
responsibilities: Design, build, and maintain scalable web applications.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define features.
Write clean, maintainable code with documentation.
requirements: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related field.
Experience with JavaScript frameworks (React, Node.js).
Knowledge of REST APIs and version control (Git).
Strong problem-solving skills and communication.
